text: Bergkirchen (Bavarian: Bergkira) is a municipality in Dachau, a district (Landkreis) in Upper Bavaria. == Subdivisions == * Bergkirchen * Deutenhausen * Feldkirchen * GÃ¼nding * Kreuzholzhausen * Lauterbach * Oberbachern * Palsweis * Unterbachern == References == Category:Dachau (district)
